name: 斯塔西·马汀 Stacy Martin
intro: The unknown actress Stacy Martin, 22, is Danish film director Lars von Trier's latest muse. Premier Model Management's model Stacey Martin is set to starr, along side Shia LaBeouf & Charlotte Gainsbourg, in Lars von Triers' Nymphomaniac (2013). The film will debut in Denmark, with a red carpet gala premiere in Copenhagen ahead of a local release on Dec. 25, 2013.
